verses.verse: Now these are the words <WH1697> of the letter <WH5612> that Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> sent <WH7971> <WH8804> from Yerushalayim <WH3389> unto the residue <WH3499> of the elders <WH2205> which were carried away captives <WH1473>, and to the Kohanim <WH3548>, and to the prophets <WH5030>, and to all the people <WH5971> whom Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> had carried away captive <WH1540> <WH8689> from Yerushalayim <WH3389> to Babylon <WH894>;

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, That after <WH6310> seventy <WH7657> years <WH8141> be accomplished <WH4390> <WH8800> at Babylon <WH894> I will visit <WH6485> <WH8799> you, and perform <WH6965> <WH8689> my good <WH2896> word <WH1697> toward you, in causing you to return <WH7725> <WH8687> to this place <WH4725>.

Then shall ye call <WH7121> <WH8804> upon me, and ye shall go <WH1980> <WH8804> and pray <WH6419> <WH8694> unto me, and I will hearken <WH8085> <WH8804> unto you.

Thus shalt thou also speak <WH559> <WH8799> to Shemaiah <WH8098> the Nehelamite <WH5161>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Then came the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> unto Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
